data.actual_result: The client crashes and roughly 2 minutes afterwards VOICE_PART event (voice disconnect) is sent
data.expected_result: The client should continue working just fine and you should be connected to the voice channel
data.short_description: [Android 9 specific] Joining a voice channel causes the client to crash on 8.0.4
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 8.0.4 - Try to join a voice channel
